title: IP and RP don't show
body: I got accept into alpha (love you guys for it) but the new client doesn't show my currect RP and IP. It's true that I don't have RP, but it also shows 0 IP, is this fixable? {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Since it's an Alpha, bugs are prone to happen. Be sure to report any using [this link](http://pbr.leagueoflegends.com/na/en_US/bugReport/create?account_id=230542170&env=NA&web_region=na&locale=en_US&app_name=LeagueClient&app_version=3092139-3151650&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+(Windows+NT+6.1%3B+WOW64)+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+(KHTML%2C+like+Gecko)+Chrome%2F49.0.2623.110+Safari%2F537.36&system_os=windows&protocol=https%3A). Because it's not a fully release and functional client, stuff like this will be fixed as it's prioritized by our development teams. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
